≤−η⁢‖∇Cλ⁢(θk)‖22+η2⁢β2⁢‖∇Cλ⁢(θk)‖22absent𝜂superscriptsubscriptnorm∇subscript𝐶𝜆subscript𝜃𝑘22superscript𝜂2subscript𝛽2superscriptsubscriptnorm∇subscript𝐶𝜆subscript𝜃𝑘22\displaystyle\leq-\eta\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}+% \eta^{2}\beta_{2}\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\right\|_{2}^{2}≤ - italic_η ∥ ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=−η⁢(1−η⁢β2)⁢‖∇Cλ⁢(θk)‖22,absent𝜂1𝜂subscript𝛽2subscriptsuperscriptnorm∇subscript𝐶𝜆subscript𝜃𝑘22\displaystyle=-\eta(1-\eta\beta_{2})\left\|\nabla C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})% \right\|^{2}_{2},= - italic_η ( 1 - italic_η italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which is non-positive as long as η≤1/β2𝜂1subscript𝛽2\eta\leq 1/\beta_{2}italic_η ≤ 1 / italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Furthermore, as long as the regularized loss is decreasing, the parameter norm is bounded by ϵ1⁢2/λsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_λ end_ARG. Lemma C.1 then implies that the gradient is β2=5⁢N⁢β⁢b3⁢max(1,ϵ13⁢L⁢(2λ)3⁢L/2)⁢L5/2subscript𝛽25𝑁𝛽superscript𝑏3max1superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ13𝐿superscript2𝜆3𝐿2superscript𝐿52\beta_{2}=5N\beta b^{3}\mathop{\rm max}\nolimits\left(1,\epsilon_{1}^{3L}\left% (\frac{2}{\lambda}\right)^{3L/2}\right)L^{5/2}italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 5 italic_N italic_β italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_max ( 1 , italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 italic_L / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-Lipschitz and, therefore, η≤1/β2𝜂1subscript𝛽2\eta\leq 1/\beta_{2}italic_η ≤ 1 / italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT holds by (10). This allows us to conclude that, for all k𝑘kitalic_k satisfying the lower bound in (10), Cλ⁢(θk)≤ϵ12subscript𝐶𝜆subscript𝜃𝑘superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12C_{\lambda}(\theta_{k})\leq\epsilon_{1}^{2}italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, hence the network achieves approximate interpolation, i.e.,

‖ZLk−Y‖F≤ϵ1⁢2.subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑘𝑌𝐹subscriptitalic-ϵ12\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2}.∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 end_ARG . (25)

Next, we show approximate balancedness. To do so, for ℓ∈{L1+2,…,L−1}ℓsubscript𝐿12…𝐿1\ell\in\{L_{1}+2,\ldots,L-1\}roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 , … , italic_L - 1 }, we define

Tℓk:=(Wℓ+1k)⊤⁢⋯⁢(WLk)⊤⁢(ZLk−Y)⁢(ZL1k)⊤⁢(WL1+1k)⊤⁢⋯⁢(Wℓ−1k)⊤.assignsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘top⋯superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊𝐿𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑘𝑌superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑘topsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊subscript𝐿11𝑘top⋯superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘topT_{\ell}^{k}:=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}\cdots(W_{L}^{k})^{\top}(Z_{L}^{k}-Y)(Z_{% L_{1}}^{k})^{\top}(W_{L_{1}+1}^{k})^{\top}\cdots(W_{\ell-1}^{k})^{\top}.italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT := ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋯ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ) ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋯ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Then, we have

Wℓk+1superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘1\displaystyle W_{\ell}^{k+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (Wℓk+1)⊤=((1−η⁢λ)⁢Wℓk−η⁢Tℓk)⁢((1−η⁢λ)⁢Wℓk−η⁢Tℓk)⊤superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘1top1𝜂𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘𝜂superscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘superscript1𝜂𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘𝜂superscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘top\displaystyle(W_{\ell}^{k+1})^{\top}=((1-\eta\lambda)W_{\ell}^{k}-\eta T_{\ell% }^{k})((1-\eta\lambda)W_{\ell}^{k}-\eta T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_η italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ( ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_η italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Similarly,

(Wℓ+1k+1)⊤⁢Wℓ+1k+1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘1\displaystyle(W_{\ell+1}^{k+1})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k+1}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(1−η⁢λ)2⁢(Wℓ+1k)⊤⁢Wℓ+1k−(1−η⁢λ)⁢η⁢((Wℓ+1k)⊤⁢Tℓ+1k+(Tℓ+1k)⊤⁢Wℓ+1k)+η2⁢(Tℓ+1k)⊤⁢Tℓ+1k.absentsuperscript1𝜂𝜆2superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘1𝜂𝜆𝜂superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘superscript𝜂2superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘\displaystyle=(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}-(1-\eta% \lambda)\eta((W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}+(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{% \ell+1}^{k})+\eta^{2}(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}.= ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) italic_η ( ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Let us define

Dℓk=(Wℓ+1k)⊤⁢Wℓ+1k−Wℓk⁢(Wℓk)⊤.superscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘topD_{\ell}^{k}=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}-W_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^% {\top}.italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Since Tℓk⁢(Wℓk)⊤=(Wℓ+1k)⊤⁢Tℓ+1ksuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘topsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘T_{\ell}^{k}(W_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}=(W_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and Wℓk⁢(Tℓk)⊤=(Tℓ+1k)⊤⁢Wℓ+1ksuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘topsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑘W_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}=(T_{\ell+1}^{k})^{\top}W_{\ell+1}^{k}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have

Dℓk+1=(1−η⁢λ)2⁢Dℓk+η2⁢((Tℓ+1k)⊤⁢Tℓ+1k−Tℓk⁢(Tℓk)⊤).superscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘1superscript1𝜂𝜆2superscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘superscript𝜂2superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘topsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘superscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘top\displaystyle D_{\ell}^{k+1}=(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}D_{\ell}^{k}+\eta^{2}((T_{\ell% +1}^{k})^{\top}T_{\ell+1}^{k}-T_{\ell}^{k}(T_{\ell}^{k})^{\top}).italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Recall that, for all k𝑘kitalic_k lower bounded in (10), ‖ZLk−Y‖F≤ϵ1⁢2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑘𝑌𝐹subscriptitalic-ϵ12\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2}∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 end_ARG and ‖Wℓk‖F≤‖θk‖2≤ϵ1⁢2/λsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘𝐹subscriptnormsuperscript𝜃𝑘2subscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆\|W_{\ell}^{k}\|_{F}\leq\|\theta^{k}\|_{2}\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_λ end_ARG, which also implies that ‖ZL1‖F≤(ϵ1⁢2/λ)L1⁢‖X‖o⁢psubscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝐹superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆subscript𝐿1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\|Z_{L_{1}}\|_{F}\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{2/\lambda}\right)^{L_{1}}\|X\|_{op}∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ( italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG 2 / italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Thus,

‖Dℓk+1‖o⁢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘1𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤(1−η⁢λ)2⁢‖Dℓk‖o⁢p+η2⁢(‖Tℓk‖o⁢p2+‖Tℓ+1k‖o⁢p2)absentsuperscript1𝜂𝜆2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝superscript𝜂2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑇ℓ1𝑘𝑜𝑝2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+\eta^{2}(\|T_{\ell}^% {k}\|_{op}^{2}+\|T_{\ell+1}^{k}\|_{op}^{2})≤ ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∥ italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∥ italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
≤(1−η⁢λ)2⁢‖Dℓk‖o⁢p+η2⁢‖ZL1k‖o⁢p2⁢‖ZLk−Y‖o⁢p2⁢(∏j≠ℓ‖Wjk‖o⁢p2+∏j≠ℓ+1‖Wjk‖o⁢p2)absentsuperscript1𝜂𝜆2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝superscript𝜂2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑘𝑜𝑝2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑘𝑌𝑜𝑝2subscriptproduct𝑗ℓsuperscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊𝑗𝑘𝑜𝑝2subscriptproduct𝑗ℓ1superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊𝑗𝑘𝑜𝑝2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+\eta^{2}\|Z_{L_{1}}^% {k}\|_{op}^{2}\|Z_{L}^{k}-Y\|_{op}^{2}(\prod_{j\neq\ell}\|W_{j}^{k}\|_{op}^{2}% +\prod_{j\neq\ell+1}\|W_{j}^{k}\|_{op}^{2})≤ ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Y ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ≠ roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ≠ roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
≤(1−η⁢λ)2⁢‖Dℓk‖o⁢p+4⁢η2⁢ϵ12⁢(2⁢ϵ12λ)L1+L−1⁢‖X‖o⁢p2.absentsuperscript1𝜂𝜆2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝4superscript𝜂2superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12superscript2superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆subscript𝐿1𝐿1superscriptsubscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2\displaystyle\leq(1-\eta\lambda)^{2}\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}+4\eta^{2}\epsilon_{1% }^{2}\left(\frac{2\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{\lambda}\right)^{L_{1}+L-1}\|X\|_{op}^{2}.≤ ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 4 italic_η start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 2 italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

By using the upper bounds η≤12⁢λ𝜂12𝜆\eta\leq\frac{1}{2\lambda}italic_η ≤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_λ end_ARG and η≤(λ2⁢ϵ12)L1+L⁢ϵ24⁢‖X‖o⁢p2𝜂superscript𝜆2superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12subscript𝐿1𝐿subscriptitalic-ϵ24superscriptsubscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2\eta\leq\left(\frac{\lambda}{2\epsilon_{1}^{2}}\right)^{L_{1}+L}\frac{\epsilon% _{2}}{4\|X\|_{op}^{2}}italic_η ≤ ( divide start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG in (10), we have that:

  • •

    if ‖Dℓk‖o⁢p≥ϵ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝subscriptitalic-ϵ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}\geq\epsilon_{2}∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, then ‖Dℓk+1‖o⁢p≤(1−η⁢λ)⁢‖Dℓk‖o⁢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘1𝑜𝑝1𝜂𝜆subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}\leq(1-\eta\lambda)\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT;

  • •

    if ‖Dℓk‖o⁢p≤ϵ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝subscriptitalic-ϵ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{op}\leq\epsilon_{2}∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, then ‖Dℓk+1‖o⁢p≤(1−η⁢λ)⁢ϵ2≤ϵ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘1𝑜𝑝1𝜂𝜆subscriptitalic-ϵ2subscriptitalic-ϵ2\|D_{\ell}^{k+1}\|_{op}\leq(1-\eta\lambda)\epsilon_{2}\leq\epsilon_{2}∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

This implies that, for all k¯≥0¯𝑘0\bar{k}\geq 0over¯ start_ARG italic_k end_ARG ≥ 0 and k1≥⌈log⁡λ⁢mλCλ⁢(θ0)−λ⁢mλlog⁡(1−η⁢α8)⌉subscript𝑘1𝜆subscript𝑚𝜆subscript𝐶𝜆subscript𝜃0𝜆subscript𝑚𝜆1𝜂𝛼8k_{1}\geq\left\lceil\frac{\log\frac{\lambda m_{\lambda}}{C_{\lambda}(\theta_{0% })-\lambda m_{\lambda}}}{\log(1-\eta\frac{\alpha}{8})}\right\rceilitalic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ ⌈ divide start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_λ italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_λ italic_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG roman_log ( 1 - italic_η divide start_ARG italic_α end_ARG start_ARG 8 end_ARG ) end_ARG ⌉,

‖Dℓk1+k¯‖o⁢p≤max((1−η⁢λ)k¯⁢‖Dℓk1‖o⁢p,ϵ2).subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓsubscript𝑘1¯𝑘𝑜𝑝maxsuperscript1𝜂𝜆¯𝑘subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓsubscript𝑘1𝑜𝑝subscriptitalic-ϵ2\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}+\bar{k}}\|_{op}\leq\mathop{\rm max}\nolimits((1-\eta\lambda)% ^{\bar{k}}\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}}\|_{op},\epsilon_{2}).∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + over¯ start_ARG italic_k end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ roman_max ( ( 1 - italic_η italic_λ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_k end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Note that

‖Dℓk1‖o⁢p≤‖Wℓ+1k1‖o⁢p2+‖Wℓk1‖o⁢p2≤4⁢ϵ12λ,subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓsubscript𝑘1𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1subscript𝑘1𝑜𝑝2superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsubscript𝑘1𝑜𝑝24superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆\|D_{\ell}^{k_{1}}\|_{op}\leq\|W_{\ell+1}^{k_{1}}\|_{op}^{2}+\|W_{\ell}^{k_{1}% }\|_{op}^{2}\leq\frac{4\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{\lambda},∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG 4 italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ,

which allows us to conclude that, for all k𝑘kitalic_k lower bounded in (10),

‖Dℓk‖2≤ϵ2.subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝐷ℓ𝑘2subscriptitalic-ϵ2\|D_{\ell}^{k}\|_{2}\leq\epsilon_{2}.∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, we have the following bounds on the representations and weights at step k𝑘kitalic_k:

‖ZL−2k‖o⁢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿2𝑘𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\left\|Z_{L-2}^{k}\right\|_{op}∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤(ϵ1⁢2λ)L−2⁢‖X‖o⁢p,absentsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆𝐿2subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}}\right)^{L-2}\|X\|_% {op},≤ ( italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
‖ZL−1k‖o⁢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿1𝑘𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\left\|Z_{L-1}^{k}\right\|_{op}∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤(ϵ1⁢2λ)L−1⁢‖X‖o⁢p,absentsuperscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆𝐿1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\leq\left(\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}}\right)^{L-1}\|X\|_% {op},≤ ( italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
‖Wℓk‖o⁢psubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑘𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\left\|W_{\ell}^{k}\right\|_{op}∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ϵ1⁢2λ, for ⁢ℓ∈{L1+1,…,L}.formulae-sequenceabsentsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝜆 for ℓsubscript𝐿11…𝐿\displaystyle\leq\epsilon_{1}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\lambda}},\,\,\,\mbox{ for }\ell% \in\{L_{1}+1,\ldots,L\}.≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG , for roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , … , italic_L } .

Hence, an application of Theorem 3.1 proves the desired result. ∎

See 5.1

Proof.

Let us split the parameter norm into the contribution from the nonlinear and linear layers:

‖θ‖22=‖θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢n‖22+‖θl⁢i⁢n‖22.superscriptsubscriptnorm𝜃22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑙𝑖𝑛22\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}=\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\left\|% \theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}.∥ italic_θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

We first lower bound both parts in terms of the product of the linear part WL:L1+1subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. This then allows us to bound the conditioning of WL:L1+1subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We start with the nonlinear part:

‖ZL1‖F≤‖X‖o⁢p⁢∏ℓ=1L1‖Wℓ‖F≤‖X‖o⁢p⁢(1L1⁢‖θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢n‖22)L12,subscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝐹subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscriptproductℓ1subscript𝐿1subscriptnormsubscript𝑊ℓ𝐹subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝superscript1subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛22subscript𝐿12\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{F}\leq\left\|X\right\|_{op}\prod_{\ell=1}^{L_{1}}% \left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{F}\leq\left\|X\right\|_{op}\left(\frac{1}{L_{1}}\left% \|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\right)^{\frac{L_{1}}{2}},∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

which implies that

‖θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢n‖22≥L1⁢(‖ZL1‖F‖X‖o⁢p)2L1≥L1⁢(‖ZL1‖o⁢p‖X‖o⁢p)2L1.superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛22subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝐹subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2subscript𝐿1subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑜𝑝subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2subscript𝐿1\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{\left\|Z_{L_{1}}% \right\|_{F}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}\geq L_{1}\left(% \frac{\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L% _{1}}}.∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Since ‖Y−WL:L1+1⁢ZL1‖F≤ϵ1subscriptnorm𝑌subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝐹subscriptitalic-ϵ1\left\|Y-W_{L:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{F}\leq\epsilon_{1}∥ italic_Y - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have

sK⁢(Y)≤sK⁢(WL:L1+1⁢ZL1)+ϵ1≤sK⁢(WL:L1+1)⁢‖ZL1‖o⁢p+ϵ1,subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑜𝑝subscriptitalic-ϵ1s_{K}(Y)\leq s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}})+\epsilon_{1}\leq s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1% })\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}+\epsilon_{1},italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) ≤ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

so that ‖ZL1‖o⁢p≥sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1sK⁢(WL:L1+1)subscriptnormsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑜𝑝subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\left\|Z_{L_{1}}\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}% +1})}∥ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG and thus

‖θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢n‖22≥L1⁢(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1sK⁢(WL:L1+1)⁢‖X‖o⁢p)2L1.superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛22subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2subscript𝐿1\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_% {1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})\left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}.∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (26)

Next, for the linear part, we know from Theorem 1 of Dai et al. (2021) that

min(Wℓ)ℓ=L1+1L:A=WL:L1+1∑ℓ=L1+1L‖Wℓ‖F2=(L−L1)⁢∑i=1Rank⁢(A)si⁢(A)2L−L1,subscriptmin:superscriptsubscriptsubscript𝑊ℓℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿𝐴subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscriptℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊ℓ𝐹2𝐿subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑖1Rank𝐴subscript𝑠𝑖superscript𝐴2𝐿subscript𝐿1\mathop{\rm min}\nolimits_{(W_{\ell})_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}:A=W_{L:L_{1}+1}}\sum_% {\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\|W_{\ell}\|_{F}^{2}=(L-L_{1})\sum_{i=1}^{\mathrm{Rank}(A)}s% _{i}(A)^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}},roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : italic_A = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Rank ( italic_A ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_A ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

so that

‖θl⁢i⁢n‖22≥(L−L1)⁢∑i=1Rank⁢(WL:L1+1)si⁢(WL:L1+1)2L−L1≥(L−L1)⁢K+2⁢log⁡|WL:L1+1|+,superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑙𝑖𝑛22𝐿subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑖1Ranksubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑠𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿112𝐿subscript𝐿1𝐿subscript𝐿1𝐾2subscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\left\|\theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq(L-L_{1})\sum_{i=1}^{\mathrm{Rank}(W_{L% :L_{1}+1})}s_{i}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}}\geq(L-L_{1})K+2\log\left|W% _{L:L_{1}+1}\right|_{+},∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Rank ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , (27)

where we used the fact that x2L−L1≥1+2L−L1⁢log⁡xsuperscript𝑥2𝐿subscript𝐿112𝐿subscript𝐿1𝑥x^{\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}}\geq 1+\frac{2}{L-L_{1}}\log xitalic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ 1 + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log italic_x.

We also have following bound on the condition number κ⁢(WL:L1+1)𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ):

κ⁢(WL:L1+1)=s1⁢(WL:L1+1)sK⁢(WL:L1+1)≤∏i=1Ksi⁢(WL:L1+1)sK⁢(WL:L1+1)=|WL:L1+1|+sK⁢(WL:L1+1)K.𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑠1subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑖1𝐾subscript𝑠𝑖subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝑠𝐾superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11𝐾\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})=\frac{s_{1}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}\leq% \prod_{i=1}^{K}\frac{s_{i}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})}=\frac{\left|W% _{L:L_{1}+1}\right|_{+}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{K}}.italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ≤ ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG = divide start_ARG | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG . (28)

By combining (26), (27), and (28) (after applying the log on both sides of (28)), we obtain

‖θ‖22superscriptsubscriptnorm𝜃22\displaystyle\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}∥ italic_θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥L1⁢(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1sK⁢(WL:L1+1)⁢‖X‖o⁢p)2L1+(L−L1)⁢K+2⁢log⁡|WL:L1+1|+absentsubscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2subscript𝐿1𝐿subscript𝐿1𝐾2subscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\displaystyle\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})% \left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}+(L-L_{1})K+2\log\left|W_{L:L_{% 1}+1}\right|_{+}≥ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log | italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≥L1⁢(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1sK⁢(WL:L1+1)⁢‖X‖o⁢p)2L1+(L−L1)⁢K+2⁢log⁡κ⁢(WL:L1+1)+2⁢K⁢log⁡sK⁢(WL:L1+1).absentsubscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝2subscript𝐿1𝐿subscript𝐿1𝐾2𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿112𝐾subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\displaystyle\geq L_{1}\left(\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})% \left\|X\right\|_{op}}\right)^{\frac{2}{L_{1}}}+(L-L_{1})K+2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_% {1}+1})+2K\log s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1}).≥ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_K + 2 roman_log italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + 2 italic_K roman_log italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

The above is lower bounded by the minimum over all possible choices of sK⁢(WL:L1+1)subscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). This minimum would be attained at sK⁢(WL:L1+1)=K−L12⁢sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1‖X‖o⁢psubscript𝑠𝐾subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11superscript𝐾subscript𝐿12subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝s_{K}(W_{L:L_{1}+1})=K^{-\frac{L_{1}}{2}}\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, thus leading to the lower bound

‖θ‖22≥L⁢K+2⁢log⁡κ⁢(WL:L1+1)−L1⁢K⁢log⁡K+2⁢K⁢log⁡sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1‖X‖o⁢p.superscriptsubscriptnorm𝜃22𝐿𝐾2𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11subscript𝐿1𝐾𝐾2𝐾subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq LK+2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})-L_{1}K\log K+2% K\log\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}.∥ italic_θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_L italic_K + 2 roman_log italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K + 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

This implies

2⁢log⁡κ⁢(WL:L1+1)2𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\displaystyle 2\log\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})2 roman_log italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≤‖θ‖22−L⁢K+L1⁢K⁢log⁡K−2⁢K⁢log⁡sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1‖X‖o⁢pabsentsuperscriptsubscriptnorm𝜃22𝐿𝐾subscript𝐿1𝐾𝐾2𝐾subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\leq\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}-LK+L_{1}K\log K-2K\log\frac{s_{% K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X\right\|_{op}}≤ ∥ italic_θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_L italic_K + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K - 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG
≤c+L1⁢K⁢log⁡K−2⁢K⁢log⁡sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1‖X‖o⁢p.absent𝑐subscript𝐿1𝐾𝐾2𝐾subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝\displaystyle\leq c+L_{1}K\log K-2K\log\frac{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}.≤ italic_c + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K - 2 italic_K roman_log divide start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

∎

See 5.2

Proof.

By assumption, there are parameters of the nonlinear part θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢nsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛\theta_{nonlin}italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that the representation at the end of the nonlinear layers already matches the outputs ZL1=Ysubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1𝑌Z_{L_{1}}=Yitalic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Y with finite parameter norm ‖θn⁢o⁢n⁢l⁢i⁢n‖22=csuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑛𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑖𝑛22𝑐\left\|\theta_{nonlin}\right\|_{2}^{2}=c∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n italic_o italic_n italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_c. We can now build a deeper network by simply setting all the linear layers to be the K𝐾Kitalic_K-dimensional identity, so that ‖θl⁢i⁢n‖22=K⁢L2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜃𝑙𝑖𝑛22𝐾subscript𝐿2\left\|\theta_{lin}\right\|_{2}^{2}=KL_{2}∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, leading to a total parameter norm of ‖θ‖22=c+K⁢L2superscriptsubscriptnorm𝜃22𝑐𝐾subscript𝐿2\left\|\theta\right\|_{2}^{2}=c+KL_{2}∥ italic_θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_c + italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Since the outputs matches the labels exactly, we have that the regularized loss is bounded by λ⁢(K⁢L2+c)/2𝜆𝐾subscript𝐿2𝑐2\lambda(KL_{2}+c)/2italic_λ ( italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c ) / 2. This implies that any global minimizer θ∗superscript𝜃\theta^{*}italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT satisfies

‖Y−ZL‖F2subscriptsuperscriptnorm𝑌subscript𝑍𝐿2𝐹\displaystyle\left\|Y-Z_{L}\right\|^{2}_{F}∥ italic_Y - italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤λ⁢(K⁢L2+c),absent𝜆𝐾subscript𝐿2𝑐\displaystyle\leq\lambda(KL_{2}+c),≤ italic_λ ( italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c ) ,
‖θ∗‖22superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscript𝜃22\displaystyle\left\|\theta^{*}\right\|_{2}^{2}∥ italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤K⁢L2+c.absent𝐾subscript𝐿2𝑐\displaystyle\leq KL_{2}+c.≤ italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c .

Choosing λ≤ϵ12K⁢L2+c𝜆superscriptsubscriptitalic-ϵ12𝐾subscript𝐿2𝑐\lambda\leq\frac{\epsilon_{1}^{2}}{KL_{2}+c}italic_λ ≤ divide start_ARG italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c end_ARG, we obtain that the global minimizer θ∗superscript𝜃\theta^{*}italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT must satisfy the assumptions of Proposition 5.1, which readily gives the desired upper bound on κ⁢(WL:L1+1)𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

To finish the proof, we show that all critical points of the regularized loss have balanced linear layers, so that we may relate the conditioning of WLsubscript𝑊𝐿W_{L}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to that of the product WL:L1+1subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11W_{L:L_{1}+1}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. At any critical point, the gradient w.r.t. to any weight matrix amongst the linear layers must be zero, that is

0=∇WℓCλ⁢(θ)=WL:ℓ+1⊤⁢(ZL−Y)⁢ZL1⊤⁢Wℓ−1:L1+1⊤+λ⁢Wℓ.0subscript∇subscript𝑊ℓsubscript𝐶𝜆𝜃superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ1topsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑌superscriptsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11top𝜆subscript𝑊ℓ0=\nabla_{W_{\ell}}C_{\lambda}(\theta)=W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}}^{% \top}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}^{\top}+\lambda W_{\ell}.0 = ∇ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

This implies that Wℓ=−1λ⁢WL:ℓ+1⊤⁢(ZL−Y)⁢ZL1⊤⁢Wℓ−1:L1+1⊤subscript𝑊ℓ1𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ1topsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑌superscriptsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11topW_{\ell}=-\frac{1}{\lambda}W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}}^{\top}W_{\ell% -1:L_{1}+1}^{\top}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT for all linear layers ℓℓ\ellroman_ℓ. Balancedness then follows directly

Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤=−1λ⁢WL:ℓ+1⊤⁢(ZL−Y)⁢ZL1⊤⁢Wℓ:L1+1⊤=Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1.subscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtop1𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ1topsubscript𝑍𝐿𝑌superscriptsubscript𝑍subscript𝐿1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊:ℓsubscript𝐿11topsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}=-\frac{1}{\lambda}W_{L:\ell+1}^{\top}(Z_{L}-Y)Z_{L_{1}% }^{\top}W_{\ell:L_{1}+1}^{\top}=W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}.italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Y ) italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, the balancedness implies that

κ⁢(WL)=κ⁢(WL:L1+1)1L1≤(‖X‖o⁢psK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)KL1⁢exp⁡(12⁢L1⁢(c−L1⁢K+L1⁢K⁢log⁡K)).𝜅subscript𝑊𝐿𝜅superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿111subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscriptnorm𝑋𝑜𝑝subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ1𝐾subscript𝐿112subscript𝐿1𝑐subscript𝐿1𝐾subscript𝐿1𝐾𝐾\kappa(W_{L})=\kappa(W_{L:L_{1}+1})^{\frac{1}{L_{1}}}\leq\left(\frac{\left\|X% \right\|_{op}}{s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}}\right)^{\frac{K}{L_{1}}}\exp\left(\frac{% 1}{2L_{1}}\left(c-L_{1}K+L_{1}K\log K\right)\right).italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ ( divide start_ARG ∥ italic_X ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_K end_ARG start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_exp ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_c - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K roman_log italic_K ) ) .

∎

See 5.3

Proof.

As the NTK is a sum over all layers, we can lower bound it by the contribution of the linear layers only. Formally, we have

‖∇θTr⁢[ZL⁢A⊤]‖22superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript∇𝜃Trdelimited-[]subscript𝑍𝐿superscript𝐴top22\displaystyle\left\|\nabla_{\theta}\mathrm{Tr}[Z_{L}A^{\top}]\right\|_{2}^{2}∥ ∇ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_θ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Tr [ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥‖∇θl⁢i⁢nTr⁢[ZL⁢A⊤]‖22absentsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript∇subscript𝜃𝑙𝑖𝑛Trdelimited-[]subscript𝑍𝐿superscript𝐴top22\displaystyle\geq\left\|\nabla_{\theta_{lin}}\mathrm{Tr}[Z_{L}A^{\top}]\right% \|_{2}^{2}≥ ∥ ∇ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l italic_i italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Tr [ italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=∑ℓ=L1+1L‖Wℓ−1:L1+1⁢ZL1⁢A⊤⁢WL:ℓ+1‖F2absentsuperscriptsubscriptℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1superscript𝐴topsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ1𝐹2\displaystyle=\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}A^{\top% }W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{F}^{2}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Let v1,…,vK∈ℝNsubscript𝑣1…subscript𝑣𝐾superscriptℝ𝑁v_{1},\dots,v_{K}\in\mathbb{R}^{N}italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be K𝐾Kitalic_K orthonormal vectors that span the preimage of ZLsubscript𝑍𝐿Z_{L}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (ZLsubscript𝑍𝐿Z_{L}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is rank K𝐾Kitalic_K as long as ϵ1≤sK⁢(Y)subscriptitalic-ϵ1subscript𝑠𝐾𝑌\epsilon_{1}\leq s_{K}(Y)italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y )), and e1,…,eK∈ℝKsubscript𝑒1…subscript𝑒𝐾superscriptℝ𝐾e_{1},\dots,e_{K}\in\mathbb{R}^{K}italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be the standard basis of ℝKsuperscriptℝ𝐾\mathbb{R}^{K}blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. We can then sum over K2superscript𝐾2K^{2}italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT possible choices of matrices A=ei⁢vjT𝐴subscript𝑒𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑣𝑗𝑇A=e_{i}v_{j}^{T}italic_A = italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT to obtain

K2⁢‖Θ‖o⁢p≥∑i,j=1K‖∇θ(eiT⁢ZL⁢vj)‖22superscript𝐾2subscriptnormΘ𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscript𝑖𝑗1𝐾superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript∇𝜃superscriptsubscript𝑒𝑖𝑇subscript𝑍𝐿subscript𝑣𝑗22\displaystyle K^{2}\|\Theta\|_{op}\geq\sum_{i,j=1}^{K}\left\|\nabla_{\theta}(e% _{i}^{T}Z_{L}v_{j})\right\|_{2}^{2}italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ roman_Θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ ∇ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_θ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_e start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥∑i,j=1K∑ℓ=L1+1L‖Wℓ−1:L1+1⁢ZL1⁢vj‖22⁢‖eiT⁢WL:ℓ+1‖22.absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖𝑗1𝐾superscriptsubscriptℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1subscript𝑣𝑗22superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑒𝑖𝑇subscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ122\displaystyle\geq\sum_{i,j=1}^{K}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\left\|W_{\ell-1:L_{1}% +1}Z_{L_{1}}v_{j}\right\|_{2}^{2}\left\|e_{i}^{T}W_{L:\ell+1}\right\|_{2}^{2}.≥ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - We know use the fact that PIm⁢WL:ℓT⁢Wℓ−1:L1+1⁢ZL1=WL:ℓ+⁢WL:ℓ⁢Wℓ−1:L1+1⁢ZL1=WL:ℓ+⁢ZLsubscript𝑃Imsuperscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ𝑇subscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓsubscript𝑊:ℓ1subscript𝐿11subscript𝑍subscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓsubscript𝑍𝐿P_{\mathrm{Im}W_{L:\ell}^{T}}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}=W_{L:\ell}^{+}W_{L:% \ell}W_{\ell-1:L_{1}+1}Z_{L_{1}}=W_{L:\ell}^{+}Z_{L}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Im italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to obtain the lower bound
