This then implies that

C⁢L2≥‖Θ‖o⁢p≥(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)2K2⁢r2⁢∑ℓ=L1+1Lκ⁢(WL:ℓ)2.𝐶subscript𝐿2subscriptnormΘ𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ12superscript𝐾2superscript𝑟2superscriptsubscriptℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿𝜅superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ2CL_{2}\geq\left\|\Theta\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}{K^{2}r^{2}}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{L}\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}.italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ ∥ roman_Θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Let us now assume by contradiction that for all the layers ℓ∈{L1+1,…,L1+M}ℓsubscript𝐿11…subscript𝐿1𝑀\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\dots,L_{1}+M\}roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , … , italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_M } we have κ⁢(WL:ℓ)2>C⁢L2⁢K2⁢r2M⁢(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)2𝜅superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ2𝐶subscript𝐿2superscript𝐾2superscript𝑟2𝑀superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ12\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}>\frac{CL_{2}K^{2}r^{2}}{M\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > divide start_ARG italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG, then

(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)2K2⁢r2⁢∑ℓ=L1+1Lκ⁢(WL:ℓ)2>C⁢L2,superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ12superscript𝐾2superscript𝑟2superscriptsubscriptℓsubscript𝐿11𝐿𝜅superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ2𝐶subscript𝐿2\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}\right)^{2}}{K^{2}r^{2}}\sum_{\ell=L_{1}+1}^{% L}\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}>CL_{2},divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which yields a contradiction. Therefore, there must be a layer within the layers ℓ∈{L1+1,…,L1+M}ℓsubscript𝐿11…subscript𝐿1𝑀\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\dots,L_{1}+M\}roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , … , italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_M } such that κ⁢(WL:ℓ)2≤C⁢L2⁢K2⁢r2M⁢(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)2𝜅superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ2𝐶subscript𝐿2superscript𝐾2superscript𝑟2𝑀superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ12\kappa(W_{L:\ell})^{2}\leq\frac{CL_{2}K^{2}r^{2}}{M\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}% \right)^{2}}italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG italic_C italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG.

Furthermore, since κ⁢(WL:ℓ)≥1𝜅subscript𝑊:𝐿ℓ1\kappa(W_{L:\ell})\geq 1italic_κ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ≥ 1, we know that

‖Θ‖o⁢p≥(sK⁢(Y)−ϵ1)2K2⁢r2⁢L2.subscriptnormΘ𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscript𝑠𝐾𝑌subscriptitalic-ϵ12superscript𝐾2superscript𝑟2subscript𝐿2\left\|\Theta\right\|_{op}\geq\frac{\left(s_{K}(Y)-\epsilon_{1}\right)^{2}}{K^% {2}r^{2}}L_{2}.∥ roman_Θ ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ divide start_ARG ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y ) - italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

∎

Appendix C Technical Results

Lemma C.1.

Let b≥1𝑏1b\geq 1italic_b ≥ 1 be s.t. ‖X:i‖2≤bsubscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2𝑏\|X_{:i}\|_{2}\leq b∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_b for all i𝑖iitalic_i. Then, inside the set of parameters with bounded weights ‖Wℓ‖o⁢p≤rℓsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑜𝑝subscript𝑟ℓ\left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{op}\leq r_{\ell}∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all ℓ∈[L]ℓdelimited-[]𝐿\ell\in[L]roman_ℓ ∈ [ italic_L ] and rℓ≥1subscript𝑟ℓ1r_{\ell}\geq 1italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ 1, the gradient of the loss ∇C0⁢(θ)∇subscript𝐶0𝜃\nabla C_{0}(\theta)∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) is 5⁢N⁢β⁢b3⁢(∏j=1Lrj)3⁢L5/25𝑁𝛽superscript𝑏3superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗3superscript𝐿525N\beta b^{3}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)^{3}L^{5/2}5 italic_N italic_β italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-Lipschitz.

Proof.

Consider two parameters θ=(Wℓ)ℓ=1L,θ′=(Wℓ′)ℓ=1Lformulae-sequence𝜃superscriptsubscriptsubscript𝑊ℓℓ1𝐿superscript𝜃′superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ′ℓ1𝐿\theta=(W_{\ell})_{\ell=1}^{L},\theta^{\prime}=(W_{\ell}^{\prime})_{\ell=1}^{L}italic_θ = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and let Zm,Zm′subscript𝑍𝑚superscriptsubscript𝑍𝑚′Z_{m},Z_{m}^{\prime}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be the corresponding outputs at layer m𝑚mitalic_m. Then, we obtain the following telescopic sum:

(Zm):i−(Zm′):i=∑ℓ=1L(Wm⁢⋯⁢Wℓ+1∘σ∘Wℓ∘σ∘Wℓ−1′⁢⋯∘W1′)⁢(X:i)−(Wm⁢⋯⁢Wℓ+1∘σ∘Wℓ′∘σ∘Wℓ−1′∘⋯∘W1′)⁢(X:i),subscriptsubscript𝑍𝑚:absent𝑖subscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝑚′:absent𝑖superscriptsubscriptℓ1𝐿subscript𝑊𝑚⋯subscript𝑊ℓ1𝜎subscript𝑊ℓ𝜎subscriptsuperscript𝑊′ℓ1⋯subscriptsuperscript𝑊′1subscript𝑋:absent𝑖subscript𝑊𝑚⋯subscript𝑊ℓ1𝜎subscriptsuperscript𝑊′ℓ𝜎subscriptsuperscript𝑊′ℓ1⋯subscriptsuperscript𝑊′1subscript𝑋:absent𝑖\begin{split}(Z_{m})_{:i}-(Z_{m}^{\prime})_{:i}&=\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}(W_{m}\cdots W% _{\ell+1}\circ\sigma\circ W_{\ell}\circ\sigma\circ W^{\prime}_{\ell-1}\cdots% \circ W^{\prime}_{1})(X_{:i})\\ &-(W_{m}\cdots{}W_{\ell+1}\circ\sigma\circ W^{\prime}_{\ell}\circ\sigma\circ W% ^{\prime}_{\ell-1}\circ\cdots\circ W^{\prime}_{1})(X_{:i}),\end{split}start_ROW start_CELL ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL start_CELL = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∘ italic_σ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∘ italic_σ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋯ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL - ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∘ italic_σ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∘ italic_σ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∘ ⋯ ∘ italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , end_CELL end_ROW (29)

so that

‖(Zm)i:−(Zm′)i:‖2≤∑ℓ=1m∏j=1m−1rj⁢‖Wℓ−Wℓ′‖F⁢‖X:i‖2≤b⁢∏j=1L−1rj⁢m⁢∑ℓ=1m‖Wℓ−Wℓ′‖F2≤b⁢∏j=1L−1rj⁢m⁢‖θ−θ′‖2.subscriptdelimited-∥∥subscriptsubscript𝑍𝑚:𝑖absentsubscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝑚′:𝑖absent2superscriptsubscriptℓ1𝑚superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝑚1subscript𝑟𝑗subscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝑊ℓsubscriptsuperscript𝑊′ℓ𝐹subscriptdelimited-∥∥subscript𝑋:absent𝑖2𝑏superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗𝑚superscriptsubscriptℓ1𝑚superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊ℓsubscriptsuperscript𝑊′ℓ𝐹2𝑏superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗𝑚subscriptdelimited-∥∥𝜃superscript𝜃′2\begin{split}\left\|(Z_{m})_{i:}-(Z_{m}^{\prime})_{i:}\right\|_{2}&\leq\sum_{% \ell=1}^{m}\prod_{j=1}^{m-1}r_{j}\left\|W_{\ell}-W^{\prime}_{\ell}\right\|_{F}% \left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\\ &\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\sqrt{m}\sqrt{\sum_{\ell=1}^{m}\left\|W_{\ell}-W^% {\prime}_{\ell}\right\|_{F}^{2}}\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\sqrt{m}\left\|% \theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}.\end{split}start_ROW start_CELL ∥ ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i : end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL start_CELL ≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL end_CELL start_CELL ≤ italic_b ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG square-root start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ≤ italic_b ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . end_CELL end_ROW (30)

Now, the gradient equals

∇C0⁢(θ)=(∑i=1N∏j=1ℓ−1Dj,i⁢Wj⁢X:i⁢(Y:i−(ZL):i)⊤⁢∏j=ℓ+1LWj⁢Dj,i)ℓ=1,…,L⊤∇subscript𝐶0𝜃subscriptsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑁superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1ℓ1subscript𝐷𝑗𝑖subscript𝑊𝑗subscript𝑋:absent𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑌:absent𝑖subscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿:absent𝑖topsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗ℓ1𝐿subscript𝑊𝑗subscript𝐷𝑗𝑖topℓ1…𝐿\nabla C_{0}(\theta)=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{N}\prod_{j=1}^{\ell-1}D_{j,i}W_{j}X_{:i% }(Y_{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i})^{\top}\prod_{j=\ell+1}^{L}W_{j}D_{j,i}\right)^{\top}_{% \ell=1,\dots,L}∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) = ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 , … , italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

where Dj,isubscript𝐷𝑗𝑖D_{j,i}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is a diagonal matrix with diagonal entries given equal to the vector σ′⁢((Zj):i)superscript𝜎′subscriptsubscript𝑍𝑗:absent𝑖\sigma^{\prime}((Z_{j})_{:i})italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) for j∈[L1]𝑗delimited-[]subscript𝐿1j\in[L_{1}]italic_j ∈ [ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] and it is equal to the identity otherwise. Similarly, we define Dj,i′superscriptsubscript𝐷𝑗𝑖′D_{j,i}^{\prime}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as a diagonal matrix with diagonal entries given equal to the vector σ′⁢((Zj′):i)superscript𝜎′subscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑍𝑗′:absent𝑖\sigma^{\prime}((Z_{j}^{\prime})_{:i})italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) for j∈[L1]𝑗delimited-[]subscript𝐿1j\in[L_{1}]italic_j ∈ [ italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] and equal to the identity otherwise. Since σ′superscript𝜎′\sigma^{\prime}italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is β𝛽\betaitalic_β-Lipschitz, we have

‖Dj,i−Dj,i′‖F≤β⁢b⁢∏j=1L−1rj⁢m⁢‖θ−θ′‖2.subscriptnormsubscript𝐷𝑗𝑖superscriptsubscript𝐷𝑗𝑖′𝐹𝛽𝑏superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗𝑚subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2\left\|D_{j,i}-D_{j,i}^{\prime}\right\|_{F}\leq\beta b\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}% \sqrt{m}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}.∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_β italic_b ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Furthermore since σ′≤1superscript𝜎′1\sigma^{\prime}\leq 1italic_σ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ 1 ,we have that ‖Dj,i‖o⁢p≤1subscriptnormsubscript𝐷𝑗𝑖𝑜𝑝1\left\|D_{j,i}\right\|_{op}\leq 1∥ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j , italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ 1. By summing over all terms that need to be changed, we obtain

‖∇C0⁢(θ)−∇C⁢(θ′)‖2subscriptnorm∇subscript𝐶0𝜃∇𝐶superscript𝜃′2\displaystyle\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)-\nabla C(\theta^{\prime})\right\|_{2}∥ ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) - ∇ italic_C ( italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤∑ℓ=1L∑i=1N‖X:i‖2⁢‖Y:i−(ZL):i‖2⁢∑m≠ℓ∏j∉{m,L}rj⁢‖Wm−Wm′‖Fabsentsuperscriptsubscriptℓ1𝐿superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑁subscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2subscriptnormsubscript𝑌:absent𝑖subscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿:absent𝑖2subscript𝑚ℓsubscriptproduct𝑗𝑚𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗subscriptnormsubscript𝑊𝑚subscriptsuperscript𝑊′𝑚𝐹\displaystyle\leq\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left% \|Y_{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\sum_{m\neq\ell}\prod_{j\not\in\{m,L\}}r_{j}% \left\|W_{m}-W^{\prime}_{m}\right\|_{F}≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m ≠ roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j ∉ { italic_m , italic_L } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+∑ℓ=1L∑i=1N‖X:i‖2⁢‖Y:i−(ZL):i‖2⁢∑m=1L1(∏j=1L−1rj)2⁢β⁢m⁢‖θ−θ′‖2⁢‖X:i‖2superscriptsubscriptℓ1𝐿superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑁subscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2subscriptnormsubscript𝑌:absent𝑖subscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿:absent𝑖2superscriptsubscript𝑚1subscript𝐿1superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗2𝛽𝑚subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2subscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2\displaystyle+\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left\|Y% _{:i}-(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\sum_{m=1}^{L_{1}}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}% \right)^{2}\beta\sqrt{m}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}\left\|X_{:i}% \right\|_{2}+ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_Y start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_β square-root start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+∑ℓ=1L∑i=1N‖X:i‖2⁢(∏j=1L−1rj)2⁢L⁢‖θ−θ′‖2⁢‖X:i‖2,superscriptsubscriptℓ1𝐿superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑁subscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗2𝐿subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2subscriptnormsubscript𝑋:absent𝑖2\displaystyle+\sum_{\ell=1}^{L}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2}\left(% \prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\right)^{2}\sqrt{L}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|% _{2}\left\|X_{:i}\right\|_{2},+ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_N end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_L end_ARG ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where the three terms correspond to the effect of changing the Wℓsubscript𝑊ℓW_{\ell}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT’s, the Dℓsubscript𝐷ℓD_{\ell}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT’s and the Zℓsubscript𝑍ℓZ_{\ell}italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT’s respectively. This can then be simplified to

‖∇C0⁢(θ)−∇C0⁢(θ)‖2subscriptnorm∇subscript𝐶0𝜃∇subscript𝐶0𝜃2\displaystyle\left\|\nabla C_{0}(\theta)-\nabla C_{0}(\theta)\right\|_{2}∥ ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) - ∇ italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_θ ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤N⁢b2⁢(1+∏j=1Lrj)⁢∏j=1L−1rj⁢L3/2⁢‖θ−θ′‖2absent𝑁superscript𝑏21superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗superscript𝐿32subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2\displaystyle\leq Nb^{2}\left(1+\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_% {j}L^{3/2}\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}≤ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+N⁢b3⁢(1+∏j=1Lrj)⁢(∏j=1L−1rj)2⁢L⁢L13/2⁢β⁢‖θ−θ′‖2𝑁superscript𝑏31superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗2𝐿superscriptsubscript𝐿132𝛽subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2\displaystyle+Nb^{3}\left(1+\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}% r_{j}\right)^{2}LL_{1}^{3/2}\beta\left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}+ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_β ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+N⁢b2⁢(∏j=1L−1rj)2⁢L3/2⁢‖θ−θ′‖2𝑁superscript𝑏2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿1subscript𝑟𝑗2superscript𝐿32subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2\displaystyle+Nb^{2}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L-1}r_{j}\right)^{2}L^{3/2}\left\|% \theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2}+ italic_N italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤5⁢N⁢β⁢b3⁢(∏j=1Lrj)3⁢L5/2⁢‖θ−θ′‖2,absent5𝑁𝛽superscript𝑏3superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗3superscript𝐿52subscriptnorm𝜃superscript𝜃′2\displaystyle\leq 5N\beta b^{3}\left(\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}\right)^{3}L^{5/2}% \left\|\theta-\theta^{\prime}\right\|_{2},≤ 5 italic_N italic_β italic_b start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 5 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_θ - italic_θ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where we use the fact that ‖(ZL):i‖2≤b⁢∏j=1Lrjsubscriptnormsubscriptsubscript𝑍𝐿:absent𝑖2𝑏superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑗1𝐿subscript𝑟𝑗\left\|(Z_{L})_{:i}\right\|_{2}\leq b\prod_{j=1}^{L}r_{j}∥ ( italic_Z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT : italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_b ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. ∎

Lemma C.2.

If the network satisfies

  • •

    approximate balancedness ‖Wℓ+1T⁢Wℓ+1−Wℓ⁢WℓT‖o⁢p≤ϵ2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑇subscript𝑊ℓ1subscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑇𝑜𝑝subscriptitalic-ϵ2\left\|W_{\ell+1}^{T}W_{\ell+1}-W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{T}\right\|_{op}\leq\epsilon_% {2}∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for ℓ∈{L1+1,⋯⁢L−1}ℓsubscript𝐿11⋯𝐿1\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\cdots L-1\}roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ⋯ italic_L - 1 },

  • •

    bounded weights ‖Wℓ‖o⁢p≤rsubscriptnormsubscript𝑊ℓ𝑜𝑝𝑟\left\|W_{\ell}\right\|_{op}\leq r∥ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_r for ℓ∈{L1+1,⋯,L}ℓsubscript𝐿11⋯𝐿\ell\in\{L_{1}+1,\cdots,L\}roman_ℓ ∈ { italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ⋯ , italic_L },

then we have ‖(WL⁢WL⊤)L2−WL:L1+1⁢WL:L1+1⊤‖o⁢p≤L222⁢ϵ2⁢r2⁢(L2−1)subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑊𝐿superscriptsubscript𝑊𝐿topsubscript𝐿2subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11top𝑜𝑝superscriptsubscript𝐿222subscriptitalic-ϵ2superscript𝑟2subscript𝐿21\left\|\left(W_{L}W_{L}^{\top}\right)^{L_{2}}-W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top% }\right\|_{op}\leq\frac{L_{2}^{2}}{2}\epsilon_{2}r^{2(L_{2}-1)}∥ ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_o italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_ϵ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 ( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where L2=L−L1subscript𝐿2𝐿subscript𝐿1L_{2}=L-L_{1}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_L - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Proof.

We denote Dℓ:=Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤−Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1assignsubscript𝐷ℓsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1D_{\ell}:=W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}-W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and

Eℓ=∑i=L1+1ℓ(Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1)i−L1−1⁢Dℓ⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−i.subscript𝐸ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑖subscript𝐿11ℓsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑖subscript𝐿11subscript𝐷ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓ𝑖E_{\ell}=\sum_{i=L_{1}+1}^{\ell}\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{i-L_% {1}-1}D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-i}.italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

We have that

(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿1\displaystyle\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}}( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =Dℓ⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1−1+Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1−1absentsubscript𝐷ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿11\displaystyle=D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}+W_{% \ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}= italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=Dℓ⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1−1+Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1⁢Dℓ⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1−2+(Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1)2⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−L1−2absentsubscript𝐷ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1subscript𝐷ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿12superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ12superscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓsubscript𝐿12\displaystyle=D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-1}+W_{% \ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}D_{\ell}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-L_{% 1}-2}+\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{2}\left(W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top% }\right)^{\ell-L_{1}-2}= italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

=(Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1)ℓ−L1+∑i=L1+1ℓ(Wℓ+1⊤⁢Wℓ+1)i−L1−1⁢Dℓ⁢(Wℓ⁢Wℓ⊤)ℓ−iabsentsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1ℓsubscript𝐿1superscriptsubscript𝑖subscript𝐿11ℓsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓ1topsubscript𝑊ℓ1𝑖subscript𝐿11subscript𝐷ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓsuperscriptsubscript𝑊ℓtopℓ𝑖\displaystyle=\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{\ell-L_{1}}+\sum_{i=L_% {1}+1}^{\ell}\left(W_{\ell+1}^{\top}W_{\ell+1}\right)^{i-L_{1}-1}D_{\ell}\left% (W_{\ell}W_{\ell}^{\top}\right)^{\ell-i}= ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ℓ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ - italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Then,

WL:L1+1⁢WL:L1+1⊤subscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊:𝐿subscript𝐿11top\displaystyle W_{L:L_{1}+1}W_{L:L_{1}+1}^{\top}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L : italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =WL⁢⋯⁢WL1+1⁢WL1+1⊤⁢⋯⁢WL⊤absentsubscript𝑊𝐿⋯subscript𝑊subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊subscript𝐿11top⋯superscriptsubscript𝑊𝐿top\displaystyle=W_{L}\cdots W_{L_{1}+1}W_{L_{1}+1}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}= italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=WL⁢⋯⁢WL1+2⁢(WL1+2⊤⁢WL1+2+EL1+1)⁢WL1+2⊤⁢⋯⁢WL⊤absentsubscript𝑊𝐿⋯subscript𝑊subscript𝐿12superscriptsubscript𝑊subscript𝐿12topsubscript𝑊subscript𝐿12subscript𝐸subscript𝐿11superscriptsubscript𝑊subscript𝐿12top⋯superscriptsubscript𝑊𝐿top\displaystyle=W_{L}\cdots W_{L_{1}+2}\left(W_{L_{1}+2}^{\top}W_{L_{1}+2}+E_{L_% {1}+1}\right)W_{L_{1}+2}^{\top}\cdots W_{L}^{\top}= italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋯ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

∎

Report Github Issue
Generated by L A T E xml

Instructions for reporting errors

We are continuing to improve HTML versions of papers, and your feedback helps enhance accessibility and mobile support. To report errors in the HTML that will help us improve conversion and rendering, choose any of the methods listed below:

  • Click the "Report Issue" button.
  • Open a report feedback form via keyboard, use "Ctrl + ?".
  • Make a text selection and click the "Report Issue for Selection" button near your cursor.
  • You can use Alt+Y to toggle on and Alt+Shift+Y to toggle off accessible reporting links at each section.

Our team has already identified the following issues. We appreciate your time reviewing and reporting rendering errors we may not have found yet. Your efforts will help us improve the HTML versions for all readers, because disability should not be a barrier to accessing research. Thank you for your continued support in championing open access for all.

Have a free development cycle? Help support accessibility at arXiv! Our collaborators at LaTeXML maintain a list of packages that need conversion, and welcome developer contributions.
